issue.title: Rendering errors when running headless on remote machine

content.raw:
No, the .docker.xauth issue is not the problem. See my comments in [issue #135](#!/osrf/subt/issues/135/new-subt-simulation-docker-image-available). I just rechecked this morning.

The problem seems to me to be that ogre is trying to create a window/display, so is not truly running headless. I’m trying to rebuild your cloudsim\_sim container with xvfb installed now to see if I can get a work-around with that.
